nodes.text: Zar Draya was a female Human Exarch of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She commanded the Star Fortress above Alderaan until 3631 BBY, when the Commander of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance boarded the Star Fortress and killed her, overloading the Sun Generator and destroying the entire battlestation in process.
Zar Draya appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the final boss of the Alderaan Star Fortress.
